articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: Premarket stocks: Rivian is America's biggest IPO since Facebook - CNN
articles.description: Rivian, the electric vehicle maker backed by Amazon and Ford, is making its Wall Street debut on Wednesday, surrounded by mania that befits a market that appears to be defying gravity.
articles.content: A version of this story first appeared in CNN Business' Before the Bell newsletter. Not a subscriber? You can sign up right here. You can listen to an audio version of the newsletter by clicking the … [+6844 chars]

articles.author: Dan Gelernter
articles.title: Life Without the Vaccine › American Greatness - American Greatness
articles.description: When the vaccine first came out, I wasn’t too eager to get it. I’m young and healthy. Statistics indicated that I was unlikely to get COVID and extremely unlikely to get a serious case of it.
